testcase.classname: Calculate Annuity BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: When duration is set as zero, validate it does not calculate annuity and an error is prompt
testcase.skipped: Given details of "5000" , "5.0" and '0' to create calculate annuity request payload.undefined When user invoke rest service to calculate annuity..........................undefined Then validate correct annuity "Invalid Duration Entered/Duration can not be zero" is calculated successfully.undefined

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The sum of all principal amounts in the schedule entries equals the total loan amount
testcase.skipped: Given details of "5000.0","5.0",'12' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.undefined When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................undefined Then validate sum of all principal amounts equals the total "5000.0" amount.undefined

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The start date determines the first due date of the calculated schedule. We assume
testcase.skipped: Given details of "5000.0","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.undefined When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................undefined Then validate each schedule entry is always due on the same day as the "2018-01-01".undefined

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The start date determines the first due date of the calculated schedule. We assume 2
testcase.skipped: Given details of "8000.0","4.0",'6' and "2018-02-04" to create generate Plan request payload.undefined When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................undefined Then validate each schedule entry is always due on the same day as the "2018-02-04".undefined

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The remaining outstanding principal of one entry equals the initial outstanding
testcase.skipped: Given details of "5000.00","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.undefined When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................undefined Then validate remaining outstanding principal of one entry equals the initial outstanding principal of the following month.undefined

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The total payment amount per month in a borrower schedule should equal the value
testcase.skipped: Given details of "5000.00","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.undefined When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................undefined Then validate borrowerPaymentAmount of each month should be equal except the last month which can differ.undefined
